MASEventService.Name: ContactUpdateEvents
MASEventService.Description: You can add or update a subscriber's contact information on this page. For example, if your subscriber requests that their bill be sent to an address different from the bill-to address, you can enter a ship-to address here.

EventMethod.Name: StartContactUpdate
EventMethod.Description: Method to initiate the updating of a contact list

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: Reference parameter identifying the specified account

Parameter.Name: UpdateAccountId
Parameter.Description: Account id of the account to be updated

EventMethod.Name: GetContactList
EventMethod.Description: Method to return the contact list of a specified user

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: Reference parameter identifying the specified account

Parameter.Name: AccountContactList
Parameter.Description: This is a parameter returned by the method containing a specified account's contact list

EventMethod.Name: AddContact
EventMethod.Description: Method to add a contact to an account

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

EventMethod.Name: SelectContact
EventMethod.Description: Method to select a contact to update

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: Reference parameter identifying the specified account

Parameter.Name: ContactType
Parameter.Description: Parameter identifying the type of contact selected

EventMethod.Name: OKUpdateContact
EventMethod.Description: Method to verify the updating of a contact

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: Reference parameter identifying the specified account

Parameter.Name: SelectedContact
Parameter.Description: Parameter identifying the selected contact to update

Parameter.Name: LoadTime
Parameter.Description: This is DateTime parameter sets the time it takes to load

EventMethod.Name: CancelContactUpdate
EventMethod.Description: Method to abort the the process of updating contacts

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: Reference parameter identifying the specified account
